string.name: Desc
string.value: It's a place where, armed with Cash, you'll be able to purchase accessories, clothes, messenger item, hair salon coupons, coupons for plastic surgery, and other various items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that allows the character to see the items it owns.\nThe items are categorized under Equip., Use, Set-Up, and Etc. items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows the equipped items, and allowing the character to equip/unequip them.\nOpen the item inventory alongside it to use the equip. items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows detailed character info and its abilities.\nUse AP to enhance many different kinds of abilities.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that shows the detailed look of the skillbook owned by the character.\nUse skill points to learn the skills available.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that lets you chat with buddies within a world.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The window that lets you change the options or game infos.\nCan change game and system option.\nCan also see quest info, party info, and the community info.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Press the button to choose the character you want to whisper to.\nPress it once more to disable whisper.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Registers the map the character is at to the teleport list. Can save up to 5 maps.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Registers the map where the character is located into the Teleport List. Can register upto 10 different places.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Delete the chosen map from the list.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Teleports to the map of your choice, or to the map where the chosen character is.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Click on Quest Alarm button if you wish to register the current quest into the Quest Alarm. Up to 5 quests can be registered in this alarm.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Distributes the remaining AP according to your level and class.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Distributes the remaining AP according to Brawler requirements.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Distributes the remaining AP according to Gunslinger requirements.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Shows you where you need to go to do this quest.

string.name: Desc
string.value: You must be between Lv. 30 and Lv. 69 to participate in this channel. You can use up to your 2nd job skills (5th for Evan and 3rd for Dual Blade). Item potential is not used.

string.name: Desc
string.value: You must be Lv. 70+ to participate in this channel. You can use up to your 3rd job skills (8th for Evan and 3rd + for Dual Blade). Item potential is not used.

string.name: Desc
string.value: You must be Lv. 120+ to participate in this channel. Item potential is not used.

string.name: Desc
string.value: You must be Lv. 180+ to participate in this channel. Item potential can be used, but special Battle Mode items will not spawn.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Battle Mode will end and you will return to Battle Square.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Once the name is made,\nthe name can't be changed.

string.name: Desc
string.value:
Can make the job advancement to Warrior, Bowman, Thief, Magician, or Pirate. 
Warrior : Minimum of Level 10, Perion
Bowman : Minimum of Level 10, Henesys
Magician : Minimum of Level 8, Ellinia
Thief : Minimum of Level 10, Kerning City
Pirate : Minimum of Level 10, The Nautilus

string.name: Desc
string.value: Accumulate enough EXP to raise the level of the character.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Your Battle Mode Rank. You can rank up by accumulating Battle EXP in Battle Mode.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The Guild you are in. Press the G key to see information about your Guild.

string.name: Desc
string.value: You will die when your HP reaches 0. Your HP decreases as you receive damage from monster attacks, use special skills, or stay in special locations. You can raise your HP up to 99,999.

string.name: Desc
string.value: You need MP to use various skills. You can raise it up to 99,999.

string.name: DescDemon
string.value: Used for all Demon Slayer skills. This stat can only be increased through the use of a Demon Aegis.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Your current EXP. When it reaches 100%, your level will increase. You can obtain EXP by hunting monsters or completing quests.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Your fame increases or decreases based on other users. Some equipment and quests require a certain level of fame.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Strength is used when wielding a melee weapon. It determines the attack strength of Warriors and Pirates (Brawlers).

string.name: Desc
string.value: As this stat increases, Accuracy and Avoidability increase. It determines the attack strength of Bowmen and Pirates (Gunslingers).

string.name: Desc
string.value: A value that determines the strength and success rate of your magic attacks. It is the most important stat for magicians. Your Max MP will increase as this stat goes up.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Your avoidability will increase as this stat increases. It determines the attack strength of thieves and the magic accuracy of magicians.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Used to increase STR, DEX, INT, LUK, HP, and MP. For STR, DEX, INT, and LUK, every 1 AP used will increase the stat by 1. For HP and MP, the increase will differ based on your character and job. You will receive 5 AP each time you level up.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Where the actual Damage is displayed. Magic Attack is displayed when you're equipped with a Wand or Staff, and Weapon Attack is displayed when you're equipped with other weapons.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Where Critical Rate is displayed. Average Critical Rate is 5%, and you can enhance it by using skills or items. Critical Damage is minimum 120% and maximum 150%, and can be enhanced by using skills or items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The higher your Weapon Defense, the less weapon damage you will receive from enemies. It is determined by adding your Weapon Defense stat to that of all equipped armor items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: The higher your Magic Defense, the less magic damage you will receive from enemies. It is determined by adding your Magic Defense stat to that of all equipped armor items.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Stat that determines the accuracy of your Weapon Attack. The higher it is, the better chance you will have at accurately aiming your weapon attacks. It is determined by adding your stat to the options of items equipped.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Stat that determines the accuracy of your Magic Attack. The higher it is, the better chance you will have at accurately aiming your magic attacks. It is determined by adding your stat to the options of items equipped.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Stat that determines your chance of avoiding weapon attacks. The higher it is, the better chance you will have at avoiding weapon attacks. It is determined by adding your stat to the options of items equipped.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Stat that determines your chance of avoiding magic attacks. The higher it is, the better chance you will have at avoiding magic attacks. It is determined by adding your stat to the options of items equipped.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Your movement speed cannot be increased beyond 140%. Skills and equipment can be used to increase or decrease your speed. Speed can be increased to 190% while riding a mount.

string.name: Desc
string.value: How high you can jump. It cannot be increased beyond 123%. Skills and equipment can be used to increase or decrease your Jump.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Your current Battle EXP. When it reaches 100%, your rank will increase. You can obtain Battle EXP by participating in Battle Mode.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Your current Battle Points. You can use the BP Exchanger in Battle Square to exchange them for Gallant Emblems. Obtain Battle Points by participating in Battle Mode.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Press Alt on keyboard to jump

string.name: Desc
string.value: Move around, climb up the ladder, and use portals using the arrow keys.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Move to the right to explore new grounds.

string.name: Desc
string.value: This is the place to purchase armors.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Fee : 150 Mesos\n\nGet on the ship that heads to Lith Harbor through Shanks. Once out of Maple Island, you will not be able to return here ever again.

string.name: Desc
string.value: This is the place to purchase weapons.

string.name: Desc
string.value: This is the place to purchase potions, scrolls, and other goods.

string.name: Desc
string.value:
Perion, Ellinia: 1200 Mesos, Henesys: 800 Mesos, Kerning City: 1000 Mesos


- 90% Discount for Beginners!!

string.name: Title
string.value: Watch Out for the Bamboo Warrior!

string.name: Desc
string.value: If a cold breeze blows through the Bamboo Forest, that's when Bamboo Warrior appears! Watch out for the Bamboo Warrior that's holding a grudge. To eliminate the warrior, slash the bamboo trees in the Forest...

string.name: Desc
string.value: A spring of clean water. It appears to have the power to detoxify the Golem's Marble filled with poison inside. Let's try dropping the marble in front of the spring. poison which fills.

string.value: in the direction of the Sky Ferry

string.name: Desc
string.value: The ship that passes through Ereve is at anchor.

string.name: Desc
string.value: You're at the entrance to Gold Richie's private lane. If you want to enter, please use your golden compass.

string.name: Desc
string.value: A phonograph that the Goddess used to listen to music. Music will play if the Goddess's LP is dropped in front of the Goddess Phonograph. Try dropping the Goddess's own record.

string.name: Title
string.value: Southperry → Lith Harbor of Victoria Island

string.name: Desc
string.value: Fee : 150 mesos\n\nBoard a ship headed to Lith Harbor by speaking with Shanks. Once you leave here, you won't be able to come back.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Double-click on Killer Mushroom Spore item to permanently penetrate the barrier, or use 1 Poison Spore dropped from the Poison Mushroom to temporarily break the barrier.

string.name: Title
string.value: Outside the Wall of Mushroom Castle

string.name: Desc
string.value: Double-click on the Thorn Remover to remove the thorns from the vine, then climb on it.

string.name: Desc
string.value: You can only enter the castle by stepping on the vine with thorns removed.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Buying the items that are equipped by the character. The existing items are not\nincluded in the purchase.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Character being put back into the state of default before walking into the cash shop.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Deletes a Cash Item and refunds a fixed percent of its price as Maple Points.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Adds 4 slots (1 row) to Equip Inventory\n3800 NX

string.name: Desc
string.value: Adds 4 slots (1 row) to Use Inventory\n3800 NX

string.name: Desc
string.value: Adds 4 slots (1 row) to Set-up Inventory\n3800 NX

string.value: Adds 4 slots (1 row) to Etc Inventory\n3800 NX

string.name: Desc
string.value: Please visit the website to charge your account.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Exchanging the item coupon into an item.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Remove all the items that the character is wearing.

string.name: Desc
string.value: Click to see "How to Gift" Details

string.name: Desc
string.value: You can receive a refund of the item purchased with NX by pressing Refund unless there was a separate notice indicating that the the item could not be withdrawn, 7 days have passed since the purchase, part of the package item has been used, or if the item was moved into your game Inventory.
